title: How to Get Married to Celia in Harvest Moon DS

steps.headline: Go to Vesta's farmhouse at 10:00am to 12:00pm not on Monday on a rainy day, and Celia must have a black heart color or higher.
Pick "Tell the Truth" when Vesta came into the room and saw you and Celia look sad.
Walk from the Main Path to Goddess Pond at 3:40pm to 6:00pm not on Monday, and Celia have a purple heart color or higher.
When Celia ask you to go with you to the pond, pick "Go with her".
Go to Dr. Hardy's clinic at 6:00am to 12:00pm on a rainy day but not in Winter, and Celia must have a blue heart color or higher.
When Dr.Hardy ask you if you have a girlfriend, tell him you're single.
Go to the Blue Bar at 4:00pm to 6:00pm not on Wednesday, and Celia must have a yellow heart color.
When Celia ask if you have anything interesting to say, tell her about your farm life(and not about the other girls).
When Celia have an orange heart color, buy a blue feather.
Once Celia have a red heart color, you can ask Celia to marry you.
steps.description: And you have to wait a week for the wedding.

text: Black Heart Event Go to Vesta's farmhouse at 10:00am to 12:00pm not on Monday on a rainy day, and Celia must have a black heart color or higher.  Pick "Tell the Truth" when Vesta came into the room and saw you and Celia look sad.  Purple Heart Event Walk from the Main Path to Goddess Pond at 3:40pm to 6:00pm not on Monday, and Celia have a purple heart color or higher.  When Celia ask you to go with you to the pond, pick "Go with her".  Blue Heart Event Go to Dr. Hardy's clinic at 6:00am to 12:00pm on a rainy day but not in Winter, and Celia must have a blue heart color or higher.  When Dr.Hardy ask you if you have a girlfriend, tell him you're single.  Yellow Heart Event Go to the Blue Bar at 4:00pm to 6:00pm not on Wednesday, and Celia must have a yellow heart color.  When Celia ask if you have anything interesting to say, tell her about your farm life(and not about the other girls).  Last Steps When Celia have an orange heart color, buy a blue feather.  Once Celia have a red heart color, you can ask Celia to marry you. And you have to wait a week for the wedding.
